title: Computer crashes when game starts
body:
Hi all,
My entire computer freezes whenever I spawn into fountain in a game. Not only that, but my computer makes this strange buzzing noise when it freezes as well. I've tried playing a game 4 separate times and my computer has frozen all four times. The only thing that has changed about my computer since I last played (which was about a month ago) was that I got the Windows 10 anniversary update. I've uninstalled and reinstalled using the Hextech Repair Tool as well as running the HRT to no avail. Has anyone else had this issue? If so, what did you do to fix it? If I need to provide some more details I'm happy to do so.

Thank you

replies.body:
We've seen this issue quite a bit specifically after the Windows 10 Anniversary update enabled the Game DVR feature inside the Xbox game bar app. This should be resolved by [disabling the game bar entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

Let me know if that worked.

Yes that worked! Thank you! That's really strange since I had never even opened the Xbox app in my entire life so I had to make an Xbox account just so I can turn that setting off. Thanks again for the help!
im having the same issue and got a leaver buster penalty as a result. i tried uninstalling the updates and reinstalling lol. nothing seems to work
Yeah I'm pretty sure I have the LeaverBuster penalty as well at this point which is why I want to know how to fix this before I attempt to even play again.
i went to the recover area in my computer settings and went back to an earlier build and thus far no freezing in custom matches which were freezing prior
